room_title: Escape room "Mayan Curse" by Wolff Escapes in Putnam
room_description: The scientist-ethnographer Neil Bernstein made many expeditions to the unknown areas of the Earth. From these journeys, he brought ancient objects back to show the world. Recently the scientist disappeared without a trace. It is known that he was last researching an ancient cult of the terrible Deities Voodoo and even managed to restore the ceremony bit by bit calling this deity. The scientist wanted to conduct a ritual that would expel the Deity forever. But something went wrong and now Bernstein has disappeared, and the fate of the ancient cult is in your hands.
